name: Generic Tower Defense
description:
Keep your base alive.

Abbr. GTG, also stands for Grand Theft Deadline

You play as a grand emperor, enjoying world conquest, when suddenly, enemy soldiers start attacking your base. You wonder, why they walk on this strangely shaped path, when they could just go straight. Also the planes are super tiny. And the planes also follow a path. Then, while taking a sip from your 7th coffee, you remember that you're playing a Ludum Dare game. If this even can be called one. When you reach wave 100, you won, let us know in the comments how difficult it was. Ok thanks bye.

theres a red x button to close a popup

click the wave counter to skip building phase

cocreated by anonyme0273
